text.data: Chapter 9 Mahal, the Continent of Miracles[end]
At long last, I have returned to Mahal... Is everybody all right?[end]
I can never forget what happened on that fateful day...[end]
Lestat: Heeheehee!![end]
The day I fled from Mahal...[end]
This is what awaits Mahal at the hands of I, Lestat![end]
What's wrong? Come out, Mahal army! Come out, Captain Taicho! Heeheehee![end]
Gunso: Captain! It is now only a matter of time until Mahal is destroyed![end]
If we don't do something, Mahal will be laid to waste![end]
Captain! Please give us our orders![end]

Taicho: Hmm...
Very well, I shall challenge Lestat myself! You all stay behind and cover me![end]
Don't be reckless! You'd only be headed for a quick death![end]
Captain, please wait. We will cut in and attack the vanguard. That will be your chance to attack Lestat...[end]
Taicho: Quiet! Who is giving the orders here?![end]
I am Taicho, captain of the army of Mahal![end]
But...[end]
Taicho: I said quiet! I am a warrior... The most important thing to me is the people of Mahal! I have no regrets in giving up my life to protect them![end]
But...[end]
Taicho: I said be quiet![end]
Celine: Darling![end]
Taicho: Celine...[end]
Celine: I agree with them.[end]
Taicho: What are you saying?! If I do not spare my life to protect Mahal, just who will?![end]
Celine: I'm only saying that you're not strong enough...[end]
Gunso: Lady Celine! What are you saying?![end]
Taicho: H-how rude![end]
Are you saying there is someone in Mahal stronger than I?[end]
I am the finest warrior in Mahal! If I must forfeit that honor, I may as well forfeit my life![end]
Sleep![end]
Celine: Forgive me, my love.[end]
Mahal will certainly lose this war. But, even if we lose today... the day will come when we destroy the Empire...[end]

Until that time comes... please stay alive...
For now...[end]
...we will defend Mahal!![end]
Celine: Let's go![end]
Yes, ma'am!![end]
Celine: Gunso, please stay behind. Take care of my husband![end]
Yes ma'am![end]
Celine: Here I come, Lestat![end]
Flame Gaze![end]
Lestat: Heeheehee! That won't work on me![end]

What has happened to Taicho?!
Where's Taicho, the best warrior in Mahal?[end]
Waaaa![end]

Lestat: Heeheehee!
Taicho! Did you get scared of me and run away? Did the best soldier in Mahal chicken out? Heeheeheehee![end]
Celine: No! He's... he's not like that![end]

Lestat: Heeheehee! Oh, but he is.
Heeheehee![end]
Die![end]
Celine: Ahhhh!![end]
I... I could not protect them...[end]
My home town, Mahal... Mahal Palace... My subjects...[end]
And... my beloved wife...[end]
I could not protect them...[end]
I could not protect a single thing...[end]
I am sad!!!!![end]
Truce: This is a map of Mahal.[end]
We know that this is a large floodgate that's currently not in use.[end]
So, we gather the enemy down in the flood basin below the gate...[end]
Then we open it up, and let the torrent take care of them for us!![end]
Was I talking too much? Sorry...[end]

[character][0x0]...
Uh, never mind...[end]
[character][0x0]... Is there somebody you love? Is there somebody you have to protect?[end]
Yes No[end1]
Even if you don't say so, I know. Princess [character][0x1], right?[end]
[character][0x0]... you are a man of happiness.[end]
Having somebody you love is the happiest thing in this world. Take good care of her.[end]
If you were to lose her... that would be the worst thing in the world...[end]
If that happens... you too might become a coward of a man like me...[end]
Chapter 13 The Magic City of Godland[end]
The Magic City of Godland...[end]
A lagoon whose independence is acknowledged even by the Empire, due to its advanced magic civilization...[end]
Hornet: Godland, coming up.[end]
Melodia: Wow! Wow! It's Godland!![end]
The Mini-Devils are excited too!! More Mini-Devils are gonna join!! Right?![end]
Manyooo!! [0x28]Go! Go! Godland is a good place! Go![0x29][end]
Hornet: Hey! Don't be bringing Mini-Devils onto the bridge![end]
Melodia: Hmph! You're a meanie, Hornet!! Get him, Mini-Devils![end]
Monyooo!! [0x28]Go! Go! Godland!! It has good things!![0x29][end]
Hornet: Hey! Knock it off![end]
Rush: Hey.[end]
Hey, Truce... Are you awake?[end]
Truce: Y-yeah, I'm awake. Just a little tired... Why?[end]
Rush: I can't sleep either... It's weird...[end]
Bikkebakke! How about you?[end]
Bikkebakke: Zzzz...[end]
Truce: Looks like he's asleep. I guess we shouldn't wake him up.[end]
Rush: Oh...[end]
Um, Truce...[end]
Truce: What?[end]
Rush: I don't know how to explain it, but... The people of Mahal... I sense something about them...[end]
Truce: ?![end]
Rush: I don't know how to... Um.. How should I put it...[end]
Truce: I think I know what you're trying to say, Rush.[end]
Rush: Then you can feel it too, Truce?![end]
Truce: Huh?! Oh, yeah.[end]
I get the feeling they're different than the people from Kahna somehow...[end]
Taicho, who fights for his late wife...[end]
Lukia, who's really strong and beautiful...[end]
Donfan, who fights so he can meet girls...[end]
Jeanne, who's a little masculine but still cool.[end]
Rush: They're different from us, you know...[end]
Truce: From a young age I was raised only as a soldier.[end]
Rush: Freedom...[end]
Do I want freedom...? I don't really know... damn it![end]
Truce: I don't really know either...[end]
Bikkebakke! You don't know either?![end][end]
